article_title: Blake Andis ready to take on role of sheriff if elected
article_text:

og.description: ABINGDON, Va. — After working for more than 25 years in law enforcement in Washington County, Abingdon native Blake Andis decided to run for sheriff.
og.title: Blake Andis ready to take on role of sheriff if elected
